TopicTitle: When i try and place parts in the VAB, they follow my cursor still a second or so after.

Articles.Content:
I am trying to place parts in the VAB, and when i do, they still continue to follow my cursor for a second. It's getting really annoying, help would be appreciated. Man i really am a goofball, a game restart fixed it.
